description: This includes the NCC trails 11 and 12 in the Ottawa Greenbelt. As well as connecting trails. Distance of 10 kilometres and 1.25 hours includes doubling back over parts of trails in order to ride and map all connecting trails.This trail includes a lot of climbing as well as rocky and rooty sections.
directions: Parking lot P3 on Corkstown Road in Ottawa.
title: Greenbelt TraILS 11 & 12
